20045000.text: Isn't that too much. Don't have one? How?

20045002.text: Oh my gosh, I'm surprised! You were surprised when you suddenly spoke to me.

20045003.text:
(Something was screaming
I was talking to you about something)

20045004.text:
Is it me? Did I do it again? How do I fix this habit... 
I don't know if I'm just telling my boss's secrets like this.

20045006.text:
Trust me, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>fertile land</> is entrusted to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul</> ...
Right now, all expectations are being met.

20045007.text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile land</>, there's no money in this damned place
which rots and dries and should all be burned.

20045008.text:
You'll have to do whatever you find or create.
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Explore the Mystery Field</>!

20045009.text: This is also a relationship, let's go together if you have time.

20045013.text: (He said he doesn't know about the economic value)

20045014.text:
Well, that's right...
From a merchant's point of view, this place is like hell.

20045015.text: (I ask if more investigation is still needed)

20045016.text:
Well, you're not wrong.
A ruined life anyway... Let's try one more shovel. Well.

20045017.text: (He will help you, so don't despair too much)

20045018.text: Thank you. Thanks to you, I was able to research this and that.

20045021.text: I think there is a possibility if the land is cleared...

20045022.text: If you don't do this many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dim</>, you won't have an answer.

20045024.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Balls</>? It's so dark... I wonder if I can extract even a dye.
Well, black dyes are common.

20045025.text:
But... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>On Youngin</> There is no such thing as giving up in the dictionary.
This is how I found it.

20045026.text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile land</>. I will burn you down
Never give up. Let's see who dies first!

20045027.text:
There aren't many people here, so
I think there's something new.

20045028.text: (Ask if there is a reason why there is no one there)

20045029.text: Business is all about taking risks.

20045030.text: You can't just go to safe places and tell them to put out good stuff!

20045031.text:
Of course, it's not that my life isn't worth it. 
But... Now is the time to take on a challenge.

20045032.text: (I will help you here for now)

20045033.text:
Thank you. 
I just checked what you caught.

20045035.text:
It's nothing special. There's nothing.
Now it's over! I have no choice but to give up.

20045036.text:
You just need to supply 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> stuff that your seniors gave you, or do it diligently.

20045037.text:
That alone will generate large sales and profits steadily...
You don't need to do anything. Actually...

20045038.text:
Hey! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Onyoungin</>, don't do anything!
Every time you do something, you only lose!

20045039.text:
Just do what your seniors tell you to do
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> do business!!! Don't try to do anything! Ahh!

20045041.text:
Hmm... yes. 
You came after your dispatch work?

20045042.text: Yes, I came here after hearing that you were here.

20045043.text:
What are you doing here? You must be tired...
I haven't had a break at the branch for a while.

20045044.text:
I couldn't find anything...
I tried to lie down on the bed, but I couldn't.

20045045.text:
What did I do to lie on this fluffy bed...
Does someone like me suit <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Paintings</>...

20045046.text:
What are you talking about?
I'm worried because I don't have anything good right now.

20045047.text:
It's been three years since I entered <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dohwasangjeon</>.
With the current performance, I probably won't be an official merchant.

20045048.text:
Hey! Hey! Is that already?
It's too early to give up yet. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertilizer</> Let's dig deeper.

20045051.text:
I'm going to investigate the monsters here 
to see if they're worth a product.

20045053.text:
Actually, I don't know.
I thought there was, but there were many cases where it wasn't.

20045054.text: I thought it wouldn't exist, but it's rare that there is...

20045055.text:
That's right. 
But I'm going to try it, thinking this is my last chance.

20045056.text: (He will help you, so let's try some more)

20045057.text:
Well, you're not wrong.
What's the big deal with one more shovel?

20045060.text:
Okay... After...
Thank you for that.

20045061.text: Why? As if it's already over...

20045062.text: Now, in fact... wouldn't it be safe to say that the decision has been made?

20045063.text:
Nana <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Gyuri</> is no different... 
I just got lucky and came at a good time...

20045064.text:
No. What are you talking about.
It's fine. You don't have to comfort me like that.

20045065.text:
If there is no official assignment this time... 
I'll write a letter of recommendation so that I can go to another boss.

20045066.text: Thank you for your words alone. I think it will be of great help.

20045067.text:
But... I'll think a little more about whether working for my boss is 
for me.

20045069.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Daebi Park</> set the rules when she assumed the management role.
There is nothing I can do about it... It's the merchant's job to deliver results.

20045070.text:
(They said it was too much
If I ever meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kwak Ho-ryong</>, I will tell you the situation)

20045071.text: If you have a good stone, go anywhere!

20045072.text: I'll buy as many good stones as I can!

20045073.text: (Ask what makes a good stone so hot)

20045074.text: Unless I'm a natural genius, so I'm not a second-class craftsman...

20045075.text: The technology eventually converges at a similar level.

20045076.text: Then what is it? It's a stone. It takes a good stone to make a good work!

20045077.text: Someone will make art out of rubbish stones.

20045078.text: But first of all, I'm not. That's why I'm looking for good stones.

20045080.text:
You make a lot of sense! 
I'm going to look for a nice stone, let's go together!

20045082.text: There are people in the world who see the shape of a stone as soon as they see it.

20045083.text: It is said that if you just sculpt to reveal its shape, a work will come out...

20045084.text: But I don't... I guess I'll just have to hit and touch it to find out.

20045086.text: Will you protect me from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>verses</> around you?

20045087.text:
I'll check it out in the meantime.
With the chisel and hammer in my hand!

20045089.text: I'm such a decent person... it makes me want to curse!

20045090.text:
Wow! It's so good. Ow... 
If you gather all the masons here, you'll get a swear word from your mouth!

20045091.text: (Ask why you curse when you like stones)

20045092.text: Aww, that's frustrating. That's it. When stones are too good...

20045093.text: A feeling of satisfaction that is not easy to express with just good words?

20045094.text: Do you feel like just passing a freshly distilled strong liquor down your throat?

20045096.text: What? Why is the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>Crew coming towards us?

20045097.text: Thank you for your hard work. This is a very dangerous place.

20045098.text: Please move to a safe place.

20045099.text: So I brought someone to help me. Okay?

20045100.text: I understand, but you are not allowed to stay here any longer.

20045101.text:
Ah! This guy... he's been in a good mood for a while, so why is he doing this!
I said I'm going to touch some stones...

20045103.text:
No. If it's dangerous, even make a base in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>!
You don't have to make it safe, right?

20045104.text: Now in the South we are at war with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue People</>.

20045105.text: I can't afford to have a crew in the rear like this.

20045106.text: I know how much money you pay for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</><textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</> in a year ?

20045107.text:
The cheeky bastards... do you know who's money for military uniforms?
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> If they didn't have the money <textColor=[110:216: 175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> I couldn't even maintain the expedition.

20045110.text: I wasn't excited. I was just logically upset.

20045111.text:
I'm taking a lot of money and 
I can't handle one of these, are you mad? Aren't you?

20045112.text: (Okay, put down the hammer in your hand)

20045113.text: Does this really know <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> as a stick...

20045114.text:
Isn't this just <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>?
Over there <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Takhoeam Gorge</ If you go to the > page, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</>Is there a circle?

20045115.text: Let's go see each other and talk.

20045116.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>? What a mess! It's like a dog yard.

20045117.text:
(I'll go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Talamic canyon</>
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Research paper</> tell them to go back)

20045118.text:
Okay, don't worry about me, go and meet '<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Blue Hydrangea</>.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255] You'll know if >Hoseok</> recommended it.

20045119.text: (May I ask if <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Blue Hydrangea</>)

20045120.text: (It is said that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>'s <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho Su-seok</> informed me that he came here)

20045121.text:
Oh, that person? I don't like him...
But that's it?

20045122.text: (I've heard that they aren't getting proper support from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</>)

20045123.text: Yeah, but I wasn't expecting much in the first place.

20045124.text: Right now, the expedition is trying to do it on our own without any support... it's a bit difficult.

20045125.text: If it's okay with you, would you like to come with me and help me?

20045126.text: First, kill the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Man</> in front of you and move to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cape Dragonhead</> do it.

20045128.text: Yes. I did my best, but I don't think I will be able to build a base here with just <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Bed</>.

20045129.text: I don't think I can maintain it no matter how I build it.

20045131.text:
I'd like to ask. Is there any better way?
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</> are constantly raiding this place...

20045132.text: I think it would be right to give up at this level.

20045134.text: I tried. They told me to pay twice the amount I'm paying now.

20045135.text:
Well, actually, when I asked for it to be doubled, I wanted to pay it...
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</>, <textColor=[78:148:215 :255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> I am not interested in anything other than the two of you.

20045136.text: In the end, it all ended in a way that each of us tried to do well.

20045137.text: (I have nothing to say, I just nod my head)

20045138.text: (then ask if you want to withdraw immediately)

20045139.text:
I should withdraw... That's reasonable...
Why can't I let go of my regrets?

20045140.text: There were many things I wanted to do when I came here...

20045141.text:
I haven't explored anything properly.
If that's the case, why did you ask to come!

20045142.text: (then asks if you want to try building a base)

20045143.text: No. It's too risky and it's going to be difficult to maintain your base even if you succeed.

20045144.text: (then ask if you want to withdraw now)

20045145.text:
I have to get out of here now... 
But I still can't go out because it's unfair.

20045146.text:
I'll have to respond later... 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</> I need to do some equipment research.

20045148.text:
Yeah! It's not as good as the plan when we first came...
You can't be successful every time.

20045149.text:
Well, I don't have much information on coming here...
I should make a report on this one too.

20045150.text:
I was on a tight budget
I tried to explore...

20045151.text:
Looking back now... it was stupid.
I'll just give up...

20045152.text:
It was like a place like Gyereuk.
Thanks to you, I came out without much loss.

20045154.text: I don't know why <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</> came here.

20045155.text:
Nevertheless, I hope this organized data will help 
to respond to <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</> in the future.

20045156.text: For a more detailed investigation, I think it would be a bit difficult with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Bed</> alone.

20045160.text: But the problem is that there is no specific place to investigate together.

20045163.text:
No... that's... <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</>
<textColor=[78:148:215:255] >I heard that you would pass it on to >Ho-Ryong Kwak</>. Is it true?

20045165.text:
So... should I say that there are still some things I haven't been able to handle properly
and some urgent ones?

20045166.text: I am a person who has no tips, so there are many things that I lack.

20045168.text:
To put it simply... 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho-Ryong Kwak</>I think it would be better to tell a more refined story.

20045169.text:
(He said he would know what it meant,
he said he would deliver it himself)

20045171.text:
(After saying hello,
Tell me about the past)

20045172.text:
Ah... yeah? Well... there's a lot to think about.
That's right. Currently, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Painting</> doesn't work properly. there is.

20045173.text:
It's just an excuse that something else happened.
I'll admit I didn't do my job properly.

20045174.text:
Preparation... How should I teach this guy?
I need to make him a decent person...

20045175.text: (He says he has nothing to say)

20045176.text:
Yes. It must be difficult to say. I know.
It would be best if I realized it myself...

20045177.text:
Unfortunately, I don't think I'm the type to be so enlightened.
I'll have to go and tell them myself.

20045178.text:
Thank you. You gave me a lot of good information...
I'll pay back this favor with interest later!

20045179.text: I've probably talked a few times about the virtues expected of a person in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Illustration</>.

20045180.text:
You may lose money in the short term.
You should not view this as a loss when investing.

20045181.text: Having the deficit more than death may be a good quality as a merchant.

20045182.text:
But whoever is in charge of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Paintings</> can
not just look at it now.

20045183.text:
Because I am a person who sees longer and looks bigger,
I can lead many people.

20045184.text:
Don't say that. 
How can I play such a role...

20045185.text:
For a small person like me,
that's not acceptable.

20045187.text:
I need someone to take care of
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Paintings</> even after I die.

20045188.text: Looking at you... I remember an ancestor who harmed my health by overdoing it while raising <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dohwasangjeon</>.

20045189.text: I'm ashamed to paint my father's name.

20045190.text:
You have to teach yourself well... After you die,
you won't be able to see that friend's face properly.

20045192.text: (Ask why you are alone in such a dangerous place)

20045193.text: I've been rather shy than taking risks with my mouth.

20045194.text:
After thinking about it, I was standing in a safe place
and waving my hand.

20045195.text:
I was just pretending to take a risk.
In a very safe place.

20045196.text: (He said he didn't try many things)

20045197.text:
I've tried one or two while maintaining a surplus.
Looking back now, it was passive.

20045198.text: (Ask the merchant whether a surplus is important)

20045199.text: That's right. It's important, but I didn't do anything to protect that one.

20045200.text: To uncover new revenue streams and prove that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Land</> needs lots of merchants

20045201.text:
Exactly... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>It's not just because of Gyuri Jang</>.
It's about myself.

20045204.text: Maybe I don't have eyes to see as a merchant...

20045205.text:
I don't know if I'm really doing something in vain
where there is nowhere.

20045206.text:
If you don't mind... 
would you like to accompany me to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Ruins</>?

20045208.text:
I think so too.
There was a reason I hadn't been in there until now.

20045209.text:
Even so, if you don't try anything to the end,
you won't be able to understand yourself.

20045210.text: (they say they couldn't find a proper nuke)

20045211.text:
Ah... they're all powder or shards.
I'll take these too and investigate them closely.

20045212.text:
In any case, since it is an item that cannot be easily obtained,
other values ​​may be found.

20045213.text:
(If value is found,
it asks if there is a way to keep getting the nukes after that)

20045214.text:
If the value outweighs the cost, you can do something about it by asking <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>
.

20045216.text:
You've been of such great help...
It's become such an atmosphere.

20045217.text:
I've only done it twice now. I don't give up.
Even if there is a loss, I will continue.

20045218.text:
Sometimes ago, when I was appointed as that official merchant,
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho-ryong Kwak</> there is a message from Master Jeonju.

20045219.text:
If you have a good trader,
I tell you to keep trying even if you lose money!

20045220.text: I'm not telling you to sit and look at the ledger!

20045221.text:
I forgot those words and lived only by looking at the numbers in the ledger.
Even if I keep trying and this ends up in a loss...

20045222.text:
So even if I take responsibility for it...
I will act as the merchant of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sunset</>.
